segments.text: Good afternoon Miss , would you be interested in buying more life insurance ? You know , you can never get enough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think my husband has some .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure he ’ s purchased enough insurance for both of you ? If something terrible happened with your husband , and he doesn ’ t have sufficient insurance , my company does have a policy that could cover you and your husband if something happened to either of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s true . If something happened to my husband , I might lose everything . Both of us have to work to keep our home , car , and our children ’ s education . I can ’ t afford that by myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could we sit and look at the policy I mentioned and see if that ’ s something suitable for you and your husband ?
segments.speaker: S1
